nodes.text: The Battle of Sronk was a battle of the Thrawn campaign. The Galactic Empire captured the planet planet Sronk.
In 9 ABY, Sronk's defenses were beaten by seven Imperial Dreadnaught-class heavy cruisers from the Katana fleet.
When Grand Admiral Thrawn appeared to return in 19 ABY, the Sronk senator, who had personally witnessed his homeworld's defeat, advised caution to the New Republic Senate.
